articles.description: Dafydd Iwan has reached number one in the iTunes chart after a battle for the top spot with Kate Bush. Following a campaign launched by Wales fans to get Dafydd Iwan ac Ar Log’s folk anthem to the top spot, the song has rocketed up the charts. The track had s…

articles.title: Rafael Nadal vs Roger Federer on a 50-50 court of clay and grass in 2007 - GIVEMESPORT
articles.description: Rafael Nadal vs Roger Federer on a court made of 50% grass and 50% clay is truly fascinating to watch.
articles.content:
Just over 15 years ago, tennis greats Rafael Nadal and Roger Federer competed in an exhibition match with a twist.

articles.title: Gareth Bale could sign for GETAFE after leaving Real Madrid - Daily Mail
articles.description: Sportsmail reported before Wales beat Ukraine in their World Cup play-off on Sunday that Bale had various offers to continue playing, and Getafe has emerged as a shock option for the Welshman.
articles.content:
Gareth Bale's desire not to uproot his family could see him make the shock move of signing for Madrid-based Getafe.

articles.title: Olympian Sharron Davies slams trans cyclist Emily Bridges as 'NOT female' - Daily Mail
articles.description: British Olympic legend Sharron Davies claimed that she would be banned from competing in international swimming if she had 'as much testosterone in my system as Emily Bridges'.
articles.content:
A fresh transgender row has broken out after trans cyclist Emily Bridges laughed off claims she has a competitive advantage over biological women.
